con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="content-service" targetNamespace="http://migus.org/webservices/content-service" xmlns:ns1="http://migus.org/webservices/content-service/fault" xmlns:ns2="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://migus.org/webservices/content-service" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://migus.org/schemas/content" xmlns:tns="http://migus.org/schemas/content"> <xsd:complexType name="contentType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="author" type="tns:authorType"/> <xsd:element name="title" type="tns:titleType"/> <xsd:element name="text" type="tns:textType"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="id" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:attribute name="created" type="xsd:date"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="newContentType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="author" type="tns:authorType"/> <xsd:element name="title" type="tns:titleType"/> <xsd:element name="text" type="tns:textType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="authorType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="titleType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="textType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="content" type="tns:contentType"/> <xsd:element name="contents"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" ref="tns:content"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="author" type="tns:authorType"/> <xsd:element name="id" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="newContent" type="tns:newContentType"/> <xsd:element name="text" type="tns:textType"/> <xsd:element name="title" type="tns:titleType"/> </xsd:schema> <xsd:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://migus.org/webservices/content-service" xmlns:content="http://migus.org/schemas/content"> <xsd:import namespace="http://migus.org/schemas/content"/> <xsd:element name="add"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="content:newContent"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="addResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="content:id"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="getByAuthor"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="content:author"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="getByAuthorResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="content:contents"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="getById"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="content:id"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="getByIdResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="content:content"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="update"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="content:id"/> <xsd:element ref="content:title"/> <xsd:element ref="content:text"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="updateResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="content:content"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="updateText"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="content:id"/> <xsd:element ref="content:text"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="updateTitle"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="content:id"/> <xsd:element ref="content:title"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema> <xsd:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://migus.org/webservices/content-service/fault" xmlns:content="http://migus.org/schemas/content" xmlns:tns="http://migus.org/webservices/content-service/fault"> <xsd:import namespace="http://migus.org/schemas/content"/> <xsd:complexType name="baseFaultType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="code" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="message" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="idFaultType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:baseFaultType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="content:id"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="contentFaultType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:baseFaultType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" ref="content:id"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" ref="content:author"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" ref="content:title"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" ref="content:text"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="notFound" type="tns:idFaultType"/> <xsd:element name="invalid" type="tns:contentFaultType"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="updateResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:updateResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="update"> <wsdl:part element="tns:update" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getByAuthor"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getByAuthor" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="addResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:addResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getByAuthorResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getByAuthorResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="add"> <wsdl:part element="tns:add" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getById"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getById" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="NotFoundException"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:notFound" name="NotFoundException"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="InvalidException"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:invalid" name="InvalidException"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getByIdResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getByIdResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="content-service"> <wsdl:operation name="getById"> <wsdl:input message="tns:getById" name="getById"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:getByIdResponse" name="getByIdResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="tns:InvalidException" name="InvalidException"></wsdl:fault> <wsdl:fault message="tns:NotFoundException" name="NotFoundException"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getByAuthor"> <wsdl:input message="tns:getByAuthor" name="getByAuthor"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:getByAuthorResponse" name="getByAuthorResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="add"> <wsdl:input message="tns:add" name="add"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:addResponse" name="addResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="update"> <wsdl:input message="tns:update" name="update"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:updateResponse" name="updateResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="tns:InvalidException" name="InvalidException"></wsdl:fault> <wsdl:fault message="tns:NotFoundException" name="NotFoundException"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="content-serviceSoapBinding" type="tns:content-service"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="getById"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="getById"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="getByIdResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="InvalidException"> <soap:fault name="InvalidException" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> <wsdl:fault name="NotFoundException"> <soap:fault name="NotFoundException" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getByAuthor"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="getByAuthor"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="getByAuthorResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="add"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="add"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="addResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="update"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="update"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="updateResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="InvalidException"> <soap:fault name="InvalidException" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> <wsdl:fault name="NotFoundException"> <soap:fault name="NotFoundException" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="content-service"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:content-serviceSoapBinding" name="content-port"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/webservices/content-service"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

con:transfers.con:name: id
